section1.title: Transform Your Memories into Instant Polaroid Stories
section1.subtitle: Upload your favorite moments, style them as nostalgic Polaroids, and turn them into GIFs or videos in seconds.

card1.title: Polaroid Styling
card1.content: Transform your photos into classic, nostalgic Polaroids with just a click.

card2.title: Customization
card2.content: Add captions, choose from various styles, and personalize your Polaroid photos to fit your story.

card3.title: Free to use
card3.content: Enjoy all the features of InstAlbum completely free, with no hidden costs or subscriptions.

section3.title: Get Started Today !
section3.subtitle: Capture your favorite moments, relive them with a nostalgic touch, and share your stories with the world.
section3.message: Loved by creators around the world. Join now and start transforming your memories.

howTo.title: How to use InstAlbum

section1.title: Import Your Photos
section1.text: Start by uploading your photos or drag-and-drop them here. You can upload multiple images at once to create a memorable collection.

subsection1.title: Add Text
subsection1.text: Write a caption or description to tell the story behind your photo.

subsection2.title: Set the Date
subsection2.text: Capture the exact moment by setting a date for your Polaroid.

subsection3.title: Customize the Border Color
subsection3.text: Choose from a variety of colors to give your Polaroid a unique style.

subsection4.title: Apply Photo Styles
subsection4.text: Choose from pre-set styles or customize your Polaroids to match your vibe.

section3.title: Export Your Creation
section3.subtitle: When you're done, choose how you'd like to share your creation

gif.title: Create a GIF
gif.text: Turn your photos into a looping animation.

video.title: Make a Video
video.text: Combine your Polaroids into a video slideshow.

download.title: Stylized Photos
download.text: Download your Polaroid-style images individually or as a collection.

howTo.bottom-text: And there you have it! You are ready to share your Polaroid stories with the world.
